sentence.Network_en: There are several infelicitous remarks in this article.
sentence.Network_cn: 文中有一些不贴切的措辞。

sentence.Network_en: The infelicitous typesetting was due to illegible copy.
sentence.Network_cn: 错误的排版是由于难以辨认的拷贝造成的.

sentence.Network_en: This infelicitous term partly refers to offering consumers a discount to build their own furniture.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个不太恰当的词汇,部分意思是指向顾客提供折扣,由他们自己组装家具.
